extendedInfo.description: GO SMS Theme Money Gold works only with GO SMS Pro application, if you don't have it, download for free from Google Play.Theme is created for people who like money and gold, even as Aladdin. It is in his cave, and around it all his wealth, gold coins and other valuables. Gins is blue, and with him his aladdin lamp. Djinns - demons and ghosts formed of pure fire without smoke (in some versions of the beliefs of the pure flame and a cloud of steam), which have a supernatural power, and are invisible, but they can take any form (human, animal or monster). They equated the hostile forces of nature to man. Believed them to be residents of the desert. The belief in jinn was a very important component of the Arabs during the religion of Islam. Djinn were very popular in the folk traditions of Islam. According to folk legends and fairy tales, the man with the spells he can, in some cases genie subordinate (eg get to meet three wishes), and imprisoned in the tube or bottle (The Book of One Thousand and One Nights). Were often in the stories feature guards treasures, were residents of the ruins, gloomy and abandoned places.This a new skin for GO SMS Pro Theme = Money Gold Theme is clear, simply designed specially for people who love the blue, and yellow colours.This Go Theme have a three great high resolution HD wallpapers for main background, and great blue icons. The best application to personalization and customization your GOSMS Theme.To apply the theme(also for GO Chat):1. Download this theme from Google Play for free2. Download GO SMS Pro for free3. Install and launch GO SMS app3. Press right to see options and press"theme4. Press "Installed" tab 5. Tap the GO SMS Theme Money Gold Try now beautiful, lazure, fire style with tons of customization options.Feel like you are now in heaven, be happy every time when you post a sms message!Sweet turquoise, caribbean blue of and azure, yellow color surely captivate you! It does not matter whether you are a man or a woman..., just try this nice theme, download and colorize your device!To change apperance settings about conversation list1. Press Menu 2. Press Advanced3. Press Appearance Settings.4. Press Conversation List CustomizationAnd now You can adjusted for each other, you can change:- Background in messages.- Displayed contact pictures.- Contact font.- Contact font color.- Time and message fonts.- Or restet this setting as to default.Sweet azure caribbean blue of and turquoise, white colors surely captivate you!To change apperance settings about conversation style1. Press Menu 2. Press Advanced3. Press Appearance Settings.4. Press Conversation customizationAnd now You can adjusted for each other, you can change:Conversation style ( bubble setting or list style)- Background- Incoming font- Outgoing font- Hyperlink color in textIf you want to use avatar icon for any contact simply change it and the new image fuchsia for each contacts are visible on conversation list and messages sms list.Disclaimer: To support making of our themes and releasing it for free, this application periodically presents advertisements in your notification bar. The permissions are for advertising. This app will add a few search access points on your device. If you do not want to use this new search page, you can either ignore it or delete it. Thank you.Check our other themes: GO Launcher EX Theme Blue lakeGO Locker Theme Blue cloudsGO Locker Theme butterfly blueGO SMS PRO Theme after rainGO SMS Theme Clouds SkyCheck other our GOSMSPro Themes, GO Locker Themes, and GO Launcher EX, free themes.Themes are published all the time, so remember to check our developer account regularly.Style was created by WorkshopTheme
